Message:
That’s the kind of person
I was proud to call my mother.

She embodied perfection—
so much so that I’ve never
once seen her act weak.
I don’t even think
I can imagine it.

Even my two sisters,
who were much older
than me, agreed.

Everyday, I’d look at my
busy mother and ask her,
“Are you okay?”

But, she’d always smile and say,
“I’m alright. Your mother’s
the Queen, after all.”

“If it’s for our village—
for our family—
there’s nothing I cannot do.”

After saying that,
she softly pat my head.

I still remember that moment
like it was yesterday.

They all felt so much
warmer than usual...
